body.name: T4TREAM Farmhouse Queen Size Bed Frame with Storage Bookcase Headboard with Sliding Barn Door, Rustic Wood Platform Bed with Charging Station, Wood Slats Support, No Box Spring Needed, Antique White
features: Gorgeous and Glamorous: Our Queen-size bed frame features an exquisite wood Bookshelf headboard with a sliding barn door system and a tall footboard with classical farmhouse elements. Its Antique White color finish is wonderfully easy on the eyes, and it has natural variations in grain, color, and texture, giving every piece a unique look, and creating a rustic, charming, cozy bedroom retreat. Matches perfectly with other furniture in the t4tream bedroom furniture series.

Exquisite Farmhouse Headboard w/ Sliding Barn Door: The chic farmhouse headboard features a great fusion of farmhouse beauty and the utility of storage space. Sliding barn doors add sophistication to the space and allow you to hide clutter behind the doors, keeping the room neat and organized. The rustic color top panel and 6 shelves provide plenty of storage/ display space and ensure everything is kept close at hand. All the shelves can be adjustable/ removable to fit items of different sizes.

Everything is so Outstanding: A convenient UL-listed AC power (2 AC outlets + 2 USB ports) which is located at the mid-shelf of the headboard, great for keeping your phone/ laptop charged while entertaining in bed without getting up from your bed. In addition, there’s plenty of space under the bed for storage boxes, extra duvets, and sheets, and you can easily vacuum under the bed to keep the space clean and dust-free. The tall footboard with farmhouse elements prevents the mattress from moving.

Stable and Sturdy as a Rock: A sturdy wood silhouette with thick metal pilasters gives this beautiful storage bed frame such a substantial presence. Equipped with 20 short hardwood slats and a newly upgraded frame joint locking system that greatly increases strength eliminates all noise and speeds up assembly. With a load capacity of up to 800LBS. No spring box is required.

Buy with Confidence: This wood bed frame comes with detailed Installation Instructions, all parts and accessories are easily identified with numbered stickers for easy recognition and we supplied a pack of spare parts in case of loss of hardware during assembly. In addition, we will do a good check before delivery, please don't hesitate if you encounter any problems with our products, we will provide you with a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: T4TREAM FARMHOUSE BED ROOM FURNITURE T4TREAM offers a full set of farmhouse bedroom furniture, including farmhouse beds, dressers, nightstands, and a vanity desk. By simply adding some rustic, natural elements to the room, you can easily get a homey, cozy, and elaborate farmhouse bedroom. You’ll love living with them for years to come.
GORGEOUS BOOKCASE HEADBOARD WITH SLIDING BARN DOOR AND CHARGING STATION

Ample Storage Space & Sliding Barn Door Classic sliding barn doors add sophistication to the space and allow you to hide clutter behind the doors, keeping the room neat and organized. The rustic color top panel and 6 shelves provide plenty of storage/ display space and make everything is kept close at hand. With Charging Station A convenient AC power (2 AC outlets + 2 USB ports) which is located at the mid-shelf of the headboard, great for keeping your phone/ laptop charged while entertaining in bed without getting up from your bed.

No Spring Box is Required Equipped w/ 10 hardwood slats and upgraded frame joint locking system that greatly increases strength and eliminates all noise and speeds up assembly. Adjustable & Removeable Shelf All the shelves have 3 levels adjustable, and they are also removable to fit items of different-sized for flexible storage Large space under the bed Large space under the bed for storage boxes, extra duvets, and sheets, and you can easily vacuum under the bed to keep the space clean and dust-free. Tall Farmhouse Footboard The high footboard with farmhouse classic elements prevents the mattress from moving.
4 Colors available, find a color that fits you! Previous page Next page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took a while to put together, but well worth it. Very sturdy and a gorgeous design. We have a 12 inch mattress and it fits perfectly with the design. The doors do rattle a bit, but if you put pillows over them it alleviates that annoyance, as it does with people as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: Really liked the style, awful design and materials. Just go to IKEA.Bought June/July 2023 and at the beginning of February 2024 it died. It was giving out over time but immediately upon purchase 4 of the cross slats broke with a week. Eventually enough slats broke that we didn’t have enough slats to support the bed and had to use some plywood to hold us up. About two weeks ago the center support decided to clock out for lunch and never come back to work. At this point all the slats went on strike and the only thing holding us was the 1” plywood we added. It was this morning February 3, 2024 the whole union fell and we had to dissolve the company… i mean bed frame and throw it out.I really liked the style it had but for the price this wasn’t what i was expecting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a nice set for the price!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We purchased the king size bed frame, two dressers, and two side tables. We love the bed frame the most, it looks nice and we love the storage, the only complaint we have is that the sliding doors are not quite if there’s a lot of movement on the bed… but they could come off if desired.As for the dressers, they’re also nice! But way smaller drawers than I’m used to, which is a personal problem, I know, but I do wish they were a bit deeper and wider.Everything assembled well. It did take us several nights after work and some extra wood glue but the directions were very straight forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good-looking, comfortable bed. Support for slats are better than old bed for which I paid over $1K
reviews.reviewText: My son and I assembled the bed, the instructions were easy to follow.I took off a star because in one step the labeling of which side was "Up" on a board seems to be backward, or the arrow should be changed to prevent confusion, along with a couple of very minor issues with the veneer in spots that won't be obvious. Also, other reviews that mention the doors rattling are accurate. The bottom of the doors each have two pieces that fit into grooves but those pieces are too thin for a snug fit, allowing them to rattle with any movements. It was a simple enough fix; we used tiny pieces of black duct tape to add thickness and make them fit properly. Voila! No more rattling, and the pieces in the grooves aren't visible so they're not an eyesore. I'm glad it was easy to fix, but I think the manufacturers should make a change so that buyers don't have to come up with their own solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this bed in the Light Rustic Oak. It arrived earlier than the estimated delivery date. The bed and 5 drawer dresser were packed very well and clearly labeled. There were no damaged parts or missing pieces. The hardware itself came individually packaged and labeled in one box. The assembly instructions were fairly easy once we got going. It took us 3 hours and 31 minutes to put this bed together. Seems to be sturdy and well made. The UL-listed AC power (2 AC outlets + 2 USB ports) are pleasantly convenient especially if you have limited power sources. LOVE the sliding barn door on the headboard to store remotes, phones, glasses, etc. leaving a clean uncluttered look. We coupled this with a 12” Nectar Memory Foam Mattress and couldn’t be happier with the results! We're considering investing in the nightstands now that we have it all put together. Kudos to the manufacturers and seller. Great product for the value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Little things make a big difference.
reviews.reviewText: Although this product was beautiful when assembled, there are little details that are important to know. I would not purchase this for a child's room because the corners are too sharp. The sliding doors are a beautiful feature, but I had to remove them the first night because they rattle. The bed still looks good without them, but the pretty design is lost. It is not as sturdy a product as other self-assembled, inexpensive furniture I have bought. Overall, I am happy but not in love with the piece. With a few small design changes, it could be quite excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great frame without the high priceThe doors do rattle a little more than I'd have liked, but the frame itself is solid and the look is gorgeousFrame holds myself and partner who is a big guy around 275I bought the dresser, vanity and side tables to go with and all look great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great look! But faulty planks and hardware
reviews.reviewText: Okay, so I absolutely love this product! I bought this piece as part of a full bedroom set. It's sturdy and solid. The look is exactly as pictured! Totally in love with the overall vibe!! The one and only snag is the faulty plank design. If I didn't love it as much as I do and if it wasn't as huge and heavy as it is, it would go back. I'm soooo annoyed with the bottom breaking regularly. It requires me to move the entire mattress, me climbing under the bed and fixing the planks-- only for it to happen again! There's nothing worse than it happening at the end of a long day... Which has been the case multiple times. Maybe it's defective? Idk. If anyone has ideas... Please let me know.
